person_enrollment_verified.name: course_id
person_enrollment_verified.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

person_enrollment_verified.name: user_id
person_enrollment_verified.description: Numerical user ID of a learner on the edX platform

person_enrollment_verified.name: verified_enroll_time
person_enrollment_verified.description: Timestamp at which a learner enrollment as a verified student

person_enrollment_verified.name: verified_unenroll_time
person_enrollment_verified.description: Timestamp at which a learner enrolled from the verified track. NULL if a learner never did.

description: Table generated with SQL query file person_enrollment_verified.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the learners who enrolled in the verified track.
